018package org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.xml.builder.spi;
019
020import static java.util.Arrays.stream;
021import static java.util.Collections.sort;
022import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.MAINTAINED;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.requireNonNullArgument;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.xml.builder.spi.SGMLPrinter.composeNamespaceString;
025
026import java.net.URI;
027import java.net.URISyntaxException;
028import java.util.ArrayList;
029import java.util.Collection;
030import java.util.HashSet;
031import java.util.List;
032import java.util.Objects;
033import java.util.Set;
034
035import org.apiguardian.api.API;
036import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
037import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.xml.builder.Namespace;
038
039/**
040 *  This class provides the support for namespaces to elements.
041 *
042 *  @author Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
043 *  @version $Id: NamespaceSupport.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $
044 *  @since 0.0.5
045 */
046@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: NamespaceSupport.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $" )
047@API( status = MAINTAINED, since = "0.0.5" )
048public class NamespaceSupport
049{
050        /*------------*\
051    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
052        \*------------*/
053    /**
054     *  The namespaces for the element.
055     */
056    private final Set<Namespace> m_Namespaces = new HashSet<>();
057
058    /**
059     *  The element that owns this {@code NamespaceSupport} instance.
060     */
061    private final Element m_Owner;
062
063        /*--------------*\
064    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
065        \*--------------*/
066    /**
067     *  Creates a new {@code NamespaceSupport} instance.
068     *
069     *  @param  owner   The element that owns this {@code NamespaceSupport}
070     *      instance.
071     */
072    public NamespaceSupport( final Element owner )
073    {
074        m_Owner = requireNonNullArgument( owner, "owner" );
075    }   //  NamespaceSupport()
076
077        /*---------*\
078    ====** Methods **==========================================================
079        \*---------*/
080    /**
081     *  Provides access to the namespaces for this element; the returned
082     *  collection is not modifiable.
083     *
084     *  @return A reference the children of this element; if the element does
085     *      not have children, an empty collection will be returned.
086     */
087    public final Collection<Namespace> getNamespaces()
088    {
089        final List<Namespace> namespaces = new ArrayList<>( m_Namespaces );
090        sort( namespaces );
091        final var retValue = List.copyOf( namespaces );
092
093        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
094        return retValue;
095    }   //  getNamespaces()
096
097    /**
098     *  Returns the reference to the owner of this instance of
099     *  {@code NamespaceSupport}.
100     *
101     *  @return The owner.
102     */
103    protected final Element getOwner() { return m_Owner; }
104
105    /**
106     *  Sets the given namespace.
107     *
108     *  @param  namespace   The namespace.
109     */
110    public final void setNamespace( final Namespace... namespace )
111    {
112        stream( requireNonNullArgument( namespace, "namespace" ) )
113            .filter( Objects::nonNull )
114            .forEach( m_Namespaces::add );
115    }   //  setNamespace()
116
117    /**
118     *  Sets the given namespace.
119     *
120     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
121     */
122    public final void setNamespace( final URI identifier )
123    {
124        setNamespace( new Namespace( identifier ) );
125    }   //  setNamespace()
126
127    /**
128     *  Sets the given namespace.
129     *
130     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
131     *  @throws URISyntaxException  The provided URI String is invalid.
132     */
133    public final void setNamespace( final String identifier ) throws URISyntaxException
134    {
135        setNamespace( new Namespace( identifier ) );
136    }   //  setNamespace()
137
138    /**
139     *  Sets the given namespace.
140     *
141     *  @param  prefix   The namespace prefix.
142     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
143     */
144    public final void setNamespace( final String prefix, final URI identifier )
145    {
146        setNamespace( new Namespace( prefix, identifier ) );
147    }   //  setNamespace()
148
149    /**
150     *  Sets the given namespace.
151     *
152     *  @param  prefix   The namespace prefix.
153     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
154     *  @throws URISyntaxException  The provided URI String is invalid.
155     */
156    public final void setNamespace( final String prefix, final String identifier ) throws URISyntaxException
157    {
158        setNamespace( new Namespace( prefix, identifier ) );
159    }   //  setNamespace()
160
161    /**
162     *  Returns the namespaces as a single formatted string.
163     *
164     *  @param  indentationLevel    The indentation level.
165     *  @param  prettyPrint The pretty print flag.
166     *  @return The attributes string.
167     */
168    public String toString( final int indentationLevel, final boolean prettyPrint )
169    {
170        final var retValue = composeNamespaceString( indentationLevel, prettyPrint, m_Owner.getElementName(), getNamespaces() );
171
172        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
173        return retValue;
174    }   //  toString()
175}
176//  class NamespaceSupport
177
178/*
179 *  End of File
180 */
